message: No Unity WebGL build has been uploaded yet. Export a build from Unity and copy it into public/unity to make it available at blackroad.io.
checklist: Export a WebGL player from Unity (File → Build Settings → WebGL → Build).
Copy the generated Build/, TemplateData/, and StreamingAssets/ folders into sites/blackroad/public/unity.
Add an index.html entry point in public/unity that bootstraps your Unity loader.
Update this status file with the new buildPath (for example "/unity/index.html") and optionally a timestamp.
